page.title: 06THE PLAY-GROUP IN BURWELL.
page.content: The children join at the age of two years and leave a little before five years.It is run by a leader with some help from parents.There are morning and afternoon sessions. The play-group has been running for nearly{15 years.}It is in a{mobile {classroom}behind the Library at the Village College.Money was raised for it from the community.A{May Fair}is usually held to raise funds. All the children that go enjoy it.In September there will be about one hundred of them. At 10am they have milk and biscuits.
